director.name: 博尔汗·阿拉维 Borhane Alaouié

this_title: Il ne suffit pas que Dieu soit avec les pauvres
introduction: A depiction through the experience of the Egyptian architect, Hassan Fathi, whose value was to plead the causes of local architecture in terms of knowledge and in economic terms that could do without any importation of the exterior. Hassan Fathi was trying to modernize the architectural traditions of each region by demonstrating that local knowledge can be modernized to meet any new need.
chinese_title: Il ne suffit pas que Dieu soit avec les pauvres
